entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
